ar_SA{
    NumberElements{
        latn{
            patterns{
                currencyFormat{"¤#0.00"}
                decimalFormat{"#0.###;#0.###-"}
            }
        }
    }
    Version{"2.0.47.53"}
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimeElements:intvector{
                7,
                4,
            }
            dayNames{
                format{
                    abbreviated{
                        "الأحد",
                        "الاثنين",
                        "الثلاثاء",
                        "الأربعاء",
                        "الخميس",
                        "الجمعة",
                        "السبت",
                    }
                }
            }
            weekend:intvector{
                5,
                0,
                6,
                86400000,
            }
        }
    }
}
